text: Jariel Pierre Gabriel (born 10 April 2001) is a St. Maartener footballer who plays for Reggae Lions in the Sint Maarten Senior League and the Sint Maarten national team. == International == On 10 September 2018, Gabriel made his senior team debut for the Sint Maarten national team, in a 0–13 loss to Haiti in a 2019–20 CONCACAF Nations League qualifying match. Gabriel came on in the 73rd minute to replace Jean Philip Sylveste. == References == == External links == * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch Antillean footballers Category:Sint Maarten international footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Jariel Gabriel
